name: Power Rack
des: Power rack, also known as full rack is a massive square-like piece of equipment.

name: Squat Rack
des: Half rack is basically one half of a power rack. It does not take a lot of space.

name: Cable Crossover Machine
des: You can usually find a good cable cross-over machine in your local gym.

name: Power Tower
des: Power towers are quite accessible these days, from various manufacturers .

name: Hammer Strength Machine
des: In most well-equipment public gyms, you can come across a hammer strength machine.

name: Chest Press Machine
des: The machine works the same pectoral muscles as a bench press, although the design.
